name: XOXO set of mini containers
description:
Keep your sweet treats and gorgeous knick knacks in these loveliest of all little heart shaped containers!

In the prettiest warm colours, they measure 8cm (w) x 6cm (h) each and come in a pack of 8.

Youâ€™ll love them undoubtedly and unconditionally!

name: Won't You Hold My Hand Single Lunch Box
description:
Nothing is as sweet as those childhood days when you skipped, holding hands with your best friend!

Go back to those fun times with this super cute Won't You Hold My Hand Single Lunch Box. Made of sturdy melamine and measuring (l) 15m x (w) 10.5cm x (h) 5cm, this delightful lunch box comes with a great snap lock lid and 2 pull out compartments for those days you want a bit of variety. Either which way, it's perfect to hold your lunch, to carry some snacks or to bring to that fun picnic in the sun.

Perfect for your lunch bag and maybe your lovely friend too!

name: Waiting for the Lunch Bell Container
description:
You'll be counting down the minutes to lunch time when you've got your savoury and sweet treats packed away in this little cutie tiered lunch box!

Made of sturdy melamine measuring (h)22cm x (l)16cm x (w)16cm, each one comes with 3 tiers in a rainbow of colours and a perfect fit lid. The top tier has also been divided into 3 compartments for extra convenience.

name: Use Your Noodle Bowls
description:
Use your noodle and grab yourself one of these cheerful bowls!

Not just for noodles, you can use these bowls for your morning cereal, some warm soup or anything you could possibly think of!

Available in an assortment of colours, they are made of sturdy melamine and measure (d) 22cm x (h) 6cm. Dishwasher safe? You bet!

Please note: the sky blue bowl included in the picture has sold out.

name: Top Me Up Mug Set
description:
You'll want to keep topping up your mug with these cute as a button mug sets!

Featuring a mug with a matching lid that turns into a side plate for some sweet treats, who could pass up on one of these?

Measuring (h)12.5cm x (d) 7cm stacked, these mug sets are available in 4 adorable designs.

name: Tip Your Hat to the Bluebird Single Lunch Box
description:
Who could resist a cute lil bluebird on a darling lil girl's hat?

Brighten up your lunch time with this delightfully fun box to hold your lunch, some yummy snacks or to take to a summertime picnic. Featuring a removable divider, you can decide the space allocation or whether you want to split up the space at all! To top it off, there's a snap lock lid to keep it all in!

Made of sturdy melamine and measures (l) 14cm x (w) 10.5cm x (h) 5cm.

name: Tea Party Thermos
description:
Keep your drinks icy cold or cozy warm in these bright thermoses. Bring a little fun and vintage vibe to your next tea party, picnic or even dinner party and be the envy of all your guests!

Serving up to 1L, these thermoses are (h)30cm x (d)20cm.

Available in 3 bright colours: pink, yellow or blue get yours today!

name: Taking out the Garbage Pedal Bin
description:
Brighten up your bathroom or bedroom with this colourful pedal bin. Taking out the garbage will take on new meaning when you have one of these!

Enough space for 3L, the bin measure 27cmx20cm.

Choose from 3 great fun colours: Dark Pink, Turquoise and Purple.

name: Taking a Stroll Zippered Canvas Tote
description:
You'll love taking this bag out on a stroll with it's charming front, back and side print!

Made of sturdy canvas and measuring (h) 38.5cm x (w) 35cm x (d) 15cm, this tote bag is perfect to fit your uni books or to hold your groceries in style. No need to worry about your things falling out, there's a zip closure to keep it all inside! With an external zippered pocket too, you'll be sure to keep your mobile, keys or bus ticket nice and safe!

name: Take a Dip Bowls
description:
Take a dip into these cute lil dipping bowls! Perfect for sauces, condiments and nibblies on the table, they can also be used for jewellery and lil knick knacks on your dresser top!

Made of sturdy melamine, the Take a Dip bowls come in a set of 6 gorgeous gelato colours and measure (h)5cm x (d)9cm each.

name: Sweet Notecards Mixed Box Set of 10
description:
Need to send some sweetness to say 'Thank You', 'Happy Birthday', 'Congrats' or just a simple 'Hello'? Why not do so with this set of mixed notecards from lovely and sweet Artist and Blogger, Cakespy?

This box set contains 10 different designs for every occasion!

Cupcake & Bacon Cocktail Party
Toasties getting Toasty
Cuppies Get Married
Cuppies have a Mini
Cuppie Love Stare - 'You're sweet and I like you'
Marie Atoinette Cuppie - 'Let them eat cupcakes!'
Cuppies Baking
Cuppies at the Library
Sweet Birthday Party
Cuppie Tea Party

The packs include 10 cards and envelopes. The envelopes are plain white, and the cards are 11.5cm x 14cm folded.

Send some sweetness today!

name: Sunkissed Happy Drinking Cups Set
description:
These happy drinking cups are sure to bring a little bit (or a lot!) of cheer to your day! Perfect for the kidlets, slippery fingers or just every day use, these gorgeous cups are made of sturdy melamine and dishwasher safe!

Perfect for the dinner table, picnic blanket or just stacked up nice and neat in your cupboards (you'll never want to hide them away though!) you'll want to use this set of happy drinking cups to remind you of the summer sun and all the fun times that come with it!

Measuring (h)9cm x (d)9cm and available in a set of 6 sunkissed colours, you can add to the set with our individual Happy Drinking Cups or perhaps with the Dinky Happy Drinking Cups Set for something a little smaller! Want to break it up with some patterns, check out our Print Me Happy Drinking Cups!

name: Spoon Full of Sugar Teaspoon Set
description:
A spoon full of anything will never taste as good as when using these delightful printed teaspoons! Perfect for everyday use, they'll be super cute to use at a picnic in the sun or that darling tea party too!

Made of sturdy melamine and measuring (l) 14cm, pick your set of 3. Available in hues of red and green, why not get both sets and mix and match! Don't forget, they're dishwasher safe too!

Looking for something a little longer? Why not check out our Reach to the Bottom Long Spoons Set! They come in the same designs but just a lil longer!

name: Spin Me Right Round Microwave Bowls
description:
You won't be able to stop yourself from watching these delightful bowls spinning around in the microwave.

Available in a set of 4 fun colours with their mismatching but perfectly cute lids, these bowls come in graduating sizes so you've always got the right one handy! Unless of course you love them so much you're using all of them all of the time!

With the largest bowl measuring (d)24 cm x (h)12 cm, these gorgeous bowls are not only microwave safe but dishwasher safe too!

name: Soup's On Bowl
description:
Soup's On all day, every day with these delightful bowls! With a modern twist to a vintage look, you won't be using these bowls just for soup so get ready to bring them out for your morning cereal, those scoops of yummy ice cream or tea party sweet treats!

Made of sturdy melamine, these charming bowls measure (h)6cm x (d)19cm and come and in 2 luscious colours: fresh coral and delish sweet raspberry!

name: Skip Through the Boring Bits Brooch
description:
Skip through the boring bits with these gorgeous brooches!

Featuring the 2 most darling girls with a skipping rope chain, you'll never have a dull look again. Give your plain t-shirts a bit of pizzaz or add a little bit of fun to that boring suit jacket.

With gold accents and gorgeous enamel colours, these delightful brooches measure. The green one measures (h) 4.5cm x (w) 3cm and the blue one measures (h) 6.5cm x (w) 4.5cm - the perfect size to show your personality but certainly not too garish and in your face!

As they say, accessorize, accessorize, accessorize!

name: Salsa Red Oven Dish
description:
Hand made in Tuscany, you can feel the sun shining from these oven dishes. Perfect for all your baking and cooking needs, you just know food will look better served up in one of these oven to table dishes.

Made of clay - clay is a natural product and over time a mottled appearance may occur on the items due to usage and the natural ageing process, which is of course, all a part of it's charm!

All pieces are handmade and hand painted so each one will vary slightly in colour and painting style. This just makes it even more special and unique!

Available in a rich gorgeous red, this oven dish measures (l)25cm x (w)20cm x (w)9cm. It's of course oven proof but also dishwasher safe!

name: Round and Round the Garden Tiered Food Containers with Carrier Strap
description:
Available in 2 poppy colour combinations, you’ll be wanting to carry these around for picnics in the garden and everywhere else!

 

Made of sturdy plastic with a strap for ease of carrying, these delightful containers measure 16cm (w) x 18cm (h) all stacked up.

 

Looking for something square with an extra tier? Check out our ‘It's Hip to be Square Tiered Food Containers with Carrier Strap’!

name: Road Less Travelled Fork Set
description:
Two sets of cutlery in front of you, which one would you choose? These gorgeous bright forks of course!

Make tea time and after dinner desserts that much sweeter with these delightful forks made of sturdy melamine measuring (l) 14cm. Available in a set of 6 they're easy peasy to wash by popping them in the dishwasher!

Need some equally gorgeous spoons? Check out our 'Ain't No Silver Spoon Set' for just as cute brights or our 'Spoon Full of Sugar Teaspoon Set' for some sweet prints.

name: Ripe for the Picking Single Lunch Box
description:
Ripe for the picking is this charming lunch box perfect for a fun picnic or to brighten up your lunch.

Made of sturdy melamine and measuring (l) 15cm x (w) 10.5cm x (h) 5cm, this delightful lunch box comes with a great snap lock lid and 2 pull out compartments for those days you want a bit of variety.

name: Reading is Totally Sweet Bookmark
description:
Reading is totally sweet! And it's about to get a whole lot sweeter with a cool Cakespy bookmark!

Measuring 2x6 inches, the bookmarks are printed on a hefty 15-point gloss stock and come in a plastic sleeve for protection.

The image includes Cuppie atop a stack of books with clever, pastry-pun titles:

Red Velvet Badge of Courage
Tart of Darkness
War & Sweet
Hedda Cobbler
Cake - 22
Much Ado About Muffin
The Great Gateau
The Adventures of Huckleberry Pie
All Quiet on the Baking Front
Lady Batterly's Lover

A perfect gift for a book-loving friend...or yourself!

name: Reach to the Bottom Long Spoon Set
description:
You won't be missing out on any dessert when you can reach to the very bottom of the ice cream sundae glass with these lovely long spoons!

Made of sturdy melamine and measuring (l) 22cm, pick your set of 3. Available in hues of red and green, why not get both sets and mix and match! Don't forget, they're dishwasher safe too!

Want something smaller? We have the same design sets in a teaspoon size! Check out our Spoon Full of Sugar Teaspoon Set for something to match or the Ain't No Silver Spoon Set to coordinate!

name: Rain, Hail or Shine Umbrella
description:
Rain, hail or shine you'll be carrying this cute lil umbrella with you wherever you go!

Available in the 2 cutest prints, stand out from the crowd of boring black umbrellas and bring a little sunshine to someone's day! 

Measuring a compact 24cm when folded, these delightful umbrellas extend to (l) 56cm x (d) 100cm.

name: Print Me Happy Drinking Cups
description:
These gorgeous printed happy drinking cups will add a little song to your speech and a little spring in your step. Now available in 4 pretty as a picture prints, they're perfect for every day use so don't be tempted to hide them away cause they're far too pretty and cute!

Measuring (h)9cm x (d)9cm these cups are not only gorgeous but dishwasher safe too!

Check out our Sunkissed Happy Drinking Cups Set if you want to buy more than one!

Looking for something a little smaller? Try our Dinky Happy Drinking Cup Sets available in 2 colour schemes.

Perhaps you want to mix and match with a few select colours. Our Happy Drinking Cups come in 7 delightful individual colours.

name: Pretty Girls and Polka Dots Printed Oven Dish with Matching Lid
description:
We all know pretty girls and polka dots are a match made in heaven! Just like this gorgeous printed oven dish and matching lid.

Bake up some sweet treats or savoury delights and you'll want to serve them in this rather than on a boring old plate.

Made of dishwasher safe glass, these oven dishes measure (l) 11.5cm x (w) 11.5cm x (h) 4cm and come with a perfect fit lid.

name: Pretty as the Can Can Canister Set
description:
Dance your way through the day with these prettier than pretty gingham canister set with matching lids! Perfect for storing those baking ingredients in the kitchen, theyâ€™re also perfect for keeping things safe and secure when traveling to a picnic!

Each measuring 9cm (w) x 10cm (h) for the small, 11cm (w) x 13cm (h) for the medium and 13cn (w) x 16cm (h) for the large, they nest into each other for easy and space saving storage. Made of sturdy melamine, theyâ€™re dishwasher safe too!

name: Pretty as a Bird Nesting Bowls with Lid Set
description:
These nesting bowls are as pretty as a bird and available in 4 scrumptious colour mixes.

Perfect for serving some sweet treats or savoury delights, you can save the leftovers with the lid provided!

Made of sturdy melamine these bowls come in a set of 4 each with it's own matching lid. The largest bowl measures (d) 22cm x (h) 11cm, with the smaller bowls nicely nesting within each other to make packing away easier! (let's be honest, they're so pretty you won't want to pack them away!

name: Popper Frog Plush Toy
description:
Popper will make your heart pop he's so cute!

With that big smile and open arms, how can you not take him home today?

Made of the most lush fabric and filled with the softest filling, you or your lil' kidlet won't be able go anywhere without him! Measuring (h) 16cm x (w) 15cm, Popper is the perfect size for kidlet hands or for displaying without him getting in the way.

Don't wait too long, he'll be popping off the shelves like hot cakes!

name: Platter Up!
description:
Platter up everything but the kitchen sink when you have one of these gorgeous platters!

Available in 3 gorgeously pretty patterns, your dinner table or tea party will be sure to impress!

Made of sturdy melamine, these cute as pie platters measure (l) 30 cm x (w) 22 cm. Even better? They're dishwasher safe too!

name: Petit Cup Lid
description: Available in orange, these lids are made for the Bluebirds Living in the Trees or Don't Rain On My Parade Petit Cups.

name: Oui Oui Paris Printed Baking Dish
description:
Poodles, lace and polka dots - it's Parisian chic all in one printed baking dish!

Dress up your mac & cheese or bake up a sweet treat in this prettier than pretty glass baking dish.

Measuring (l) 17.5cm x (w) 8cm x (h) 6.5cm, these gorgeous baking dishes are oven and microwave safe. Easy!

name: One cake, two cakes, three tiers full
description:
Tea time has never been so sweet with these delightful tiered servers.

In 2 sweet colours, theyâ€™re perfect for a gorgeous high tea at home or a picnic outside. Too pretty to pop food on? You can use these for your gorgeous jewellery, make up and other knick knacks too!

Measuring 28cm (w) x 32cm (h), theyâ€™re made of melamine and can be dismantled for easy storage. And to top it all of they're dishwasher safe too.

name: Once Upon A Time Lunch Box Set
description:
Live happily ever after with these darling 4 piece nesting lunch box sets. Perfect for packing your lunch and nibbles for the day, these box sets are just as delightful to pack your picnic or lay out at your next tea party.

Featuring a different charming design on each box, they perfectly nest within each other so packing and stacking will not be an issue again.

Available in 2 different Snow White Designs and 1 of Alice in Wonderland, you'll be hard pressed to pick which fairytale you'll want to live happily ever after in.

name: On Your Side Plate Set
description:
Everyone will be on your side when you have these delightfully bright coloured side plates!

Use them to brighten up a dinner party, to bring a bit of cool to your next picnic or a splash of colour to that dull high tea. Any which way, you'll be smiling ear to ear!

Available in a set of 6 and made of sturdy melamine, these plates measure (d) 20cm and dishwasher safe too!

name: Ni Hao Noodle Bowl Set
description:
These cute Ni Hao Noodle bowls are perfect for adults and kidlets alike! The set comes with a perfectly sized bowl and lid that can be removed and used as a side plate.

Made of sturdy melamine, this bowl set is dishwasher safe and perfect for kidlets and slippery fingers.

Available in delightful pink with rainbow squares or fun blue with little people, these noodle bowls come with matching chopsticks perfect for those learning to use them!

name: Mix it Up Bowl Set
description:
Youâ€™ll be mixing it all up in these gorgeously striped mixing bowl sets! Perfect for all your baking needs, you can mix it up and use them to serve salads or other sweet treats.

Each set comes with 3 bowls measuring 21.5cm (w) x 10cm (h) for the small, 24.5cm (w) x 13cm (h) for the medium and 28cm (w) x 16cm (h) for the large.

Choose from 2 fun colours - Red stripe (mint and red stripe and pink on the inside) or Green stripe (pink and green stripe and blue on the inside).

name: Mind My Placemat
description:
Never loose your place at the dinner table when you set your very own adorable Mind My Placemat! Not into table settings? These placemats are just as cute displayed as artwork! Pop it in a frame and you're ready to show!

Measuring (l) 43.5cm x (w) 28cm, the Mind My Placemat is available in 3 darling designs. With Blowing Bubbles, Smiles and Shadow Puppets to choose from, which one will you get?

name: Message in a Bottle Notecards Set
description:
Have some exciting news to send? Perhaps you just want to say 'Hello!'. Literally write your message in a bottle with these charming notecards featuring 4 bottle designs.

Hand illustrated by lovely New Zealand artist and blogger, dear colleen, these great notecards are perfect for that little message you want to send across the shores (or land!).

Each set contains 4 different designs printed on 250gsm paper stock measuring (w)11.2cm x (h)16cm and comes with matching high quality smooth off white self-seal envelopes.

name: Measure for Measure Cups
description:
Successful baking is all about having perfectly measured ingredients. Boring.

Not anymore if you have these lovely measuring cups at hand! With a cute retro look and super handy handles, you'll find yourself baking more and more. Family and friends will certainly not be complaining and neither will you!

Available in a set of 3, these gorgeous measuring cups come in 3 lovely hues: sky blue, sweet lavender and lovely red.

Made of melamine, they're easy to just pop in the dishwasher while you enjoy your yummy baked goods.

name: Love to do the Dishes Sponge Set
description:
Washing up has never been more fun or lovable! Add a splash of colour and fun into your washing and you'll never have to dread it again!

Each pack comes with 3 sponges in 3 different colours. Sponge on one side, gentle scourer on the other. Each sponge measure (h)3 cm x (l)7cm x (w)8cm

Get excited about doing the dishes again!

name: Love My Latte Thermo Cup
description:
Love your latte in the morning... afternoon... anytime of the day? Why not look super cute sipping that hot java while saving the environment too? Coffee not your thing? You can use it for your tempting tea too!

Made of sturdy plastic, these gorgeous reusable coffee cups measure (d) 9cm x (h) 14cm.

Buy one for yourself and one for your coffee buddies too! Who knows... you may just catch the eye of that super cute barista at your local cafe or coffee cart!

name: Lick the Sweetness Baking Scraper
description:
Make baking sweeter with this gorgeous silicone spatula. With the prettiest of floral patterns and available in 3 colours, buy a spare to stop nanna stealing yours!

Measuring 7cm (w) x 32cm (l), they come in light blue, pink and red.

name: Let's Have Tea for Two Tea Set
description:
Tea time has never been so sweet as with this tea set for two!

This 5 piece set contains teapot and lid, 2 stackable mugs and a tea strainer that sits inside, you'll be finding any excuse to have tea... even if just for one!

Available in 4 darling designs, which set will you pick? Maybe get a couple or a few so no one gets left out!

name: Let's Cuddle Canvas Tote Bag
description:
You'll be so cuddlesome with this super cute bag! Featuring a print on the front and the back plus the real pretty stripe handles, you won't be able to resist taking this bag everywhere!

Made of sturdy canvas and measuring (h) 37cm x (w) 36cm x (h) 17cm, this tote bag is perfect to fit your uni books or to hold your groceries in style. No need to worry about your things falling out, there's a snaplock closure to keep it all inside! With an external zippered pocket too, you'll be sure to keep your mobile, keys or bus ticket nice and safe!

name: Jumbo Java to Have Here Mug
description:
Forget takeout coffee, you'll be having your java in when you have these gorgeous jumbo mugs at home!

A little bit vintage style; a little bit Alice's Tea Party, these mugs are perfect for every occasion. Maybe that big mug of coffee to start the day, tea to warm you up, ice cream for a naughty midnight snack or lollies on the treats table. Thinking outside of the square, you can store your jewels and baubels in them too!

Made of sturdy melamine, these delightful mugs measure (d) 12cm x (h) 9cm and are dishwasher safe to boot!

name: Juicy Sweet Notepads
description:
Bring a little juicy sweetness to your school work or office desk with these adorable fruity notepads!

Measuring (h) 11cm x (w) 5cm (apple) / (h) 12.5cm x (w) 4.5cm (pear) there's enough space for a quick reminder, a little doodle or cute love note. Each memo pad comes with its own realistic looking stem, 150 sheets, matching paper clip and cute fruit net.

Available in apple or pear, which will you choose to write your sweet notes on?

name: I'll Take that in the Library, Thanks Jeeves Drinking Glass
description:
With the sweetest print of kidlets in the library, how can you resist buying this petit drinking glass?

Perfect for that lil drink, you can have your shot of espresso or juice in one of these adorable drinking glasses and maybe even encourage the kidlets to take up reading!

Made of dishwasher safe glass, these drinking glasses measure (d) 6.5cm x (h) 9cm.

name: It's Hip to be Square Tiered Food Containers with Carrier Strap
description:
It's so hip to be square with these food containers in the most gorgeous colours! Picnicking and bringing your lunch to school/work has never been so cool!

Don't picnic or bring your lunch to school/work? Use these to store your little bits and bobs and lead a delightfully uncluttered life!

Available in 2 colour schemes, which one will you pick? Ruby Red or Blushing Pink?

Made of sturdy plastic with a strap for ease of carrying, these delightful containers measure (l) 15cm x (w) 15cm x (h) 18cm all stacked up. Even better? They're dishwasher safe too!

name: It's a Pile Up Plate Set
description:
Pile 'em up or lay 'em out - either which way, get them out!

Not only for sweet treats or nibblies for the table, you can use these adorable plates for your bits and bobs everywhere else in the house!

Available in Pretty Sakura or Cute Rabbit, these tier plates come in a set of 3 in decreasing sizes.

name: I'll Have the California Roll Sushi Tray Set
description:
Line up your sushi on these splendid sushi trays in a rainbow of colours sure to make them look even yummier!

Can't bear the thought of seaweed and raw fish? Cucumber sandwiches, cupcakes and sweet treats would look just as great on these delightfully coloured trays!

Made of sturdy melamine, these gorgeous sushi trays come in a set of 6 available in Summer Brights and Pastels. Measuring (l) 23cm x (w) 16cm x (h) 2cm, they're dishwasher safe too!

name: How 'bout them Apples Canvas Tote Bag
description:
How 'bout them Apples canvas tote bag? With a gorgeous front and back design, this bag is ready to go with you anywhere you want to take it.

Made of sturdy canvas and measuring (l) 37cm x (w) 36cm x (d) 17cm, this tote bag is perfect to fit your uni books or to hold your groceries in style. No need to worry about your things falling out, there's a snap button closure to keep it all inside! With an external zippered pocket too, you'll be sure to keep your mobile, keys or bus ticket nice and safe!

name: Happy Drinking Cups
description:
These happy drinking cups are sure to bring a little bit (or a lot!) of cheer to your day! Perfect for the kidlets, slippery fingers or just every day use, these gorgeous cups are made of sturdy melamine and dishwasher safe!

Measuring (h)9cm x (d)9cm and available in 7 delightful colours, you can mix and match, buy your favourite colour or collect them all! Nothing looks better than having all the colours of the rainbow on your dinner table, picnic blanket or just stacked up nice and neat in your cupboards! (you'll never want to hide them away though!)

Check out our Sunkissed Happy Drinking Cups Set if you want to buy more than one!

Looking for something a little smaller? Try our Dinky Happy Drinking Cup Sets available in 2 colour schemes.

Want to mix it up with a patterned cup? Checkout our Print Me Happy Drinking Cup!

name: Goody Gum Drops Zippered Canvas Tote
description:
You'll be saying goody goody gum drops when you buy one of these darling canvas tote bags! Featuring a front, back and side print, you'll just love carrying this bag around!

Made of sturdy canvas and measuring (h) 37cm x (w) 35cm x (d) 12.5cm, this tote bag is perfect to fit your uni books or to hold your groceries in style. No need to worry about your things falling out, there's a zip closure to keep it all inside! With an external zippered pocket too, you'll be sure to keep your mobile, keys or bus ticket nice and safe!

name: Funhouse Round Food Containers
description:
It's a funhouse when you get to pack your lunch or stow away dinner's leftovers in these scrumptiously coloured food containers.

Think outside of the kitchen and you're sure to find many more uses around the house!

The largest measuring (d) 15cm x (h)10cm, these food containers come in a set of 3 with mismatched merry colours. You know what? They're dishwasher safe too!

name: Fun as a Mix Tape Bowl
description:
Baking and cooking will never be so fun again with these retro inspired yet modern designed mixing bowls! The handy spout makes it a versatile tool in any kitchen.

Available in 3 luscious jewel toned colours, which one will you pick? Mix it up and get all 3 for the inner Pierre Herme in you.

Made of sturdy melamine with a capacity of 1.5L, these delightful bowls measure (w) 20cm x (h) 12cm.

name: Flourishing Mini Vases
description:
Reminiscent of Aladdin's cave these cute flourishing vases are perfect for displaying a single flower. Line them up in a row, on your window sill or on your mantle and create a pretty picture! Thinking outside of the square? You could use these as candle holders too!

Made of gorgeous glass and available in 3 stunning jewel like colours: Fresh Lime, Pretty Pink or Sky Blue, each vase measures a cute (h)8cm x (d)4cm.

name: First Come First Served Tray
description:
Everyone will want to be served first when you have one of these deliciously cute serving trays!

Make serving coffee and sugared treats that much sweeter and when not in service, it's just as charming on display on the kitchen counter.

Made of sturdy melamine, and measuring (l)40cm x (w) 25cm, it's an easy spray and wipe for a quick clean.

name: Fifi Rabbit Plush Toy
description:
Fifi is the loveliest Rabbit in town!

In a super cute and vibrant orange tunic, she's ready to take on any adventure with you or your kidlet.

Made of the most lush fabric and filled with the softest filling, you or your lil' kidlet won't be able to stop hugging her! Measuring (h) 17cm x (w) 15cm, Fifi is the perfect size for kidlet hands or for displaying without her getting in the way. With such cuteness, would you REALLY be displaying her on a shelf?

name: Eat, Drink and Be Merry Single Lunch Box
description:
Eat, Drink and Be Merry with this delightful lunch box! Perfect to brighten up your lunch time meal, you can bring it to a picnic tea party too! Featuring a removable divider, you can decide the space allocation or whether you want to split up the space at all! To top it off, there's a snap lock lid to keep it all in!

Made of sturdy melamine and measures (l) 14cm x (w) 10.5cm x (h) 5cm.

name: Don't Rain On My Parade Petit Cup
description:
No one will be able to rain on your parade with this super cute and sweet petit cup.

Perfect for that just enough serving of dessert or to display little sweet treats, you could even use these lil cups for the bits and bobs on your dresser table.

Made of dishwasher safe glass, these petit cups measure (d) 6.5cm x (h) 5.5cm.

Why not get the matching lid and make your own jelly cup desserts or protect your jewelery from dust?

This design not quite your thing, why not check out the Bluebirds Living in the Trees version?

name: Don't Forget to Pack the Picnic Plates
description:
The sun is shining bright and all you want to do is get outside and have a picnic! Don't forget to pack this set of cheerful and kaleidoscopic plates to make your day even more spectacular!

A little dreary outside? Why not lay down a picnic blanket indoors or set up a tea party instead? Where ever you use these plates, they're sure to bring a smile to every face and good times galore!

Made of durable plastic, this set of gorgeous candy coloured plates come in a pack of 6 and nicely packed in a net bag.

name: Divine Lotus Bowl
description:
These divine lotus bowls are perfect to add that little ladylike touch to your table, picnic setting or even dresser top. Ideal for dips, sauces or nibblies you could even try jewellery or other knick knacks!

Made of sturdy melamine, these gorgeous bowls measure (h)6cm x (w)12cm and come in 3 lovely berry hues: red, coral & fuchsia - choose yours now! Easy to wash, they can be popped into the dishwasher too!

name: Dinky Happy Drinking Cups Set
description:
These dinky happy drinking cups are sure to bring a little bit (or a lot!) of cheer to your day! Perfect for the kidlets, slippery fingers or just every day use, these gorgeous cups are made of sturdy melamine and dishwasher safe!

Slightly smaller than our Happy Drinking Cups, these dinky cups are perfect for the dinner table, picnic blanket or just stacked up nice and neat in your cupboards (you'll never want to hide them away though!). Use these sets of dinky happy drinking cups to remind you of good times and yummy picnics!

Measuring (h)6cm x (d) 7cm and available in a set of 6, these gorgeous cup sets come in Summer Brights or Spring Brights.

Looking for something a little bigger? Give our Sunkissed Happy Drinking Cups Set or individual Happy Drinking Cups a try! Want something with a pattern? Checkout the Print Me Happy Drinking Cups.

name: Celebration Espresso Cups
description:
Need your morning shot of espresso to get you started? Why not add an extra spark to your day with these bright and fun espresso cups?

Coffee not your thing? These little cups are the perfect size for the kidlets to drink their daily shot of vitamin C instead!

Made of sturdy melamine and measuring (h)5cm x (d)6cm this gorgeous set of espresso cups come in an assortment of 6 celebration colours that can easily be washed in the dishwasher!

name: Bunny Hop Single Lunch Box
description:
This lunch box is a hop and step away from being far too cute! Then again...maybe not!

Brighten up your lunch time with this delightfully darling lunch box. You can even pack it for that next picnic with friends. Featuring a removable divider, you can decide the space allocation or whether you want to split up the space at all! To top it off, there's a snap lock lid to keep it all in!

Made of sturdy melamine and measures (l) 14cm x (w) 10cm x (h) 5cm.

name: Brush Away My Baking Woes Basting Brush
description:
Brush away your baking woes with these gorgeous basting brushes! Baking and basting has never been so bright and fun!

Made of durable silicone and measuring (l)22cm x (w)5cm, the Brush Away My Baking Woes Basting brush is available in 2 splendid colour schemes, choose between a hot pink and emerald green brush featuring the cutest pengiun or a teal blue and bubblegum pink brush with the wisest of all owls.

Why not buy one for yourself and one for your sweet baker friend?

name: Bluebirds Living in the Trees Petit Cup
description:
With the sweetest print of bluebirds and trees, how can you resist buying one of these petit cups?

Perfect for that just enough serving of dessert or to display little sweet treats, you could even use these lil cups for the bits and bobs on your dresser table.

Made of dishwasher safe glass, these petit cups measure (d) 6.5cm x (h) 5.5cm.

Why not get the matching lid and make your own jelly cup desserts or protect your jewelery from dust?

Bluebirds not quite your thing? Checkout out our Don't Rain On My Parade design for something a little different.

name: Blooming Flower Bowl
description:
Reminiscent of the good ol' times, these gorgeous floral bowls are perfect for just about anything! Whether it's a bright spark to start the day with your morning cereal, or a sneaky bowl of yummy ice cream for that midnight snack - the blooming flower bowl can hold it all! Bring it out for that sweet tea party, a darling picnic or even an enchanting dinner party with your friends.

Made of sturdy melamine, these delightful bowls measure (h)8cm x (d) 16cm and come in 4 delightful colours: Cherry, Raspberry, Lime and Strawberry. As always, they're dishwasher safe too!

name: Birds Sweeten the Pot
description:
The sweetest birds sit upon these gorgeously cute ceramic jars perfect for honey, sugar or even jam!

Measuring 14cm (w) x 18cm (h), theyâ€™re bigger than your average jam jar so you can sweeten you day even more!

Available in pink or blue, brighten your breakfast table now.

name: Bent-o Doing the Washing Onigiri Sponge
description:
Bring a little cuteness to your dish washing with these smiley onigiri sponges!

Available in white (sold out) or yellow and measuring (w) 13cm x (h) 9cm these sponges are cute enough to eat and certainly gentle enough to scrub those dishes and pans.

Don't want to muck up your cute Onigiri Sponge with icky food scraps? It can be used for bath time fun too!

name: Be a China Doll Soup Spoons Set
description:
You'll be the doll of the dinner party when you serve up with these delightful soup spoons!

Made of sturdy melamine, these gorgeous soup spoons are available in a set of 6 in two pretty colour schemes. Measuring (l) 14cm x (h) 2cm they're dishwasher safe too!

name: At Your Service Platters
description:
Serving up wonâ€™t be the same with these cute dotty platters with the sweetest edging.

Measuring 46cm (w) x 32cm (h), thereâ€™s plenty of space to serve up your gorgeously delicious treats.

Made of sturdy melamine, theyâ€™re easy to wash and safe in the dishwasher too!

name: Are You Gonna Be My Girl Cards
description:
Whose heart will you win over with these pretty as a picture girly cards?

Available in 3 delightful designs, there's space to write a sweet note and comes with a coordinating envelope too! Want to keep it for yourself? These would be just as charming in a pretty frame and hung up on your wall.

name: Archie Pig Plush Toy
description:
Archie is the cutest lil' Pig around!

With the rosiest red cheeks and in his stripe tee, he's in the latest fashions and surely ready to sail around the harbour.

Made of the most lush fabric and filled with the softest filling, you or your lil' kidlet will be cuddling Archie all day, everyday! Measuring (h) 18cm x (w) 14cm, Archie is the perfect size for kidlet hands or for displaying without him getting in the way. Though to be honest, once you give Archie a cuddle, you won't be displaying him anywhere!

name: Ain't No Silver Spoon Set
description:
You won't be accused of being born with a silver spoon in your mouth when you have this set of delightfully fun and colourful short spoons!

Perfect to sweeten your tea or coffee; to sneak some ice cream or to daintily eat that jelly cup, you'll be bringing these out at every occasion!

Made of sturdy melamine, they measure (l) 14cm and come in a set of 6. Dishwasher safe? Yes siree!

Want some patterned ones to mix and match? Try our Spoon Full of Sugar Teaspoon Set or how about the Reach to the Bottom Long Spoon Set for something a little longer.

name: A Stitch in Time Card Sets
description:
Save time by having a handful of these cuter than cute cards at hand for that next card sending occasion. Be it a birthday; miss you, thank you or hidey ho message, you'll be sure to bring a smile to every recipient! Each individually machine sewn card comes with a matching white envelope and measures (w) 11cm x (h) 14cm.

Not just for snail mail, these little cuties are just as perfect framed and hanging up on the wall! Spruce up your kitchen with the Breakfast Club or perhaps decorate the kidlets' rooms.

Available in sets of 3 different designs, the only time you'll use up is deciding which set to buy!

  • Cupcake Smiles
  • Ice Cream Delight
  • It's A Cookout
  • Breakfast Club
